dt-option.name: searchPanes.controls
dt-option.summary: Hide the control buttons and disable searching in all panes

type.description: By setting the `-init searchPanes.controls` option to `false` the control buttons will be hidden and searching will be disabled in all of the panes.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchPanes.controls` parameter is `true`, meaning that as standard the control buttons will be included and searching will be active in the panes.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchPanes will be displayed with the control buttons included in the interface with searching enabled. However if the value of `-init searchPanes.controls` is set to `false` then the control buttons will no longer be displayed and searching will be disabled in all of the panes.
The control buttons can be hidden and searching disabled for individual panes by the `-init columns.searchPanes.controls` option.

example.title: Hide control buttons and disable searching for all panes
